name: hemingway
title: Hemingway
desc: A structured, editorial foundation for long-form content
article:
A clean, podcast-ready theme for publishing interviews, articles, and media with clarity and structure. Built for creators, teams, and studios who take their content seriously.


  • Learn more about Hemingway
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • Landing Page
  • Blog Landing Page
  • Podcast Landing Page
  • About
  • Subscription
  • Blog (CC)
  • Authors (CC)
  • Podcast (CC)
  • Legal pages (CC)
  • Contact
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Error 404


(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Podcast & Blog Tags
  • Podcast & Blog Paywall
  • Pagination
  • Custom audio player
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
